<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// matrix with a scalar).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ShuffleVectorInst&gt;</a>(V))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SV-&gt;isZeroEltSplat();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Match any mul operation (fp or integer).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="#ad3ea8483bb698ffc64dc1adf7c84a098"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ad3ea8483bb698ffc64dc1adf7c84a098">m&#95;AnyMul</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LTy &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RTy &amp;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#afc43bc5ec4b20c7c5d663bef90da6066">m&#95;CombineOr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a532515120d78196926b68c48460087ab">m&#95;Mul</a>(L, R), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2473234214d47e1991056897d735d82d">m&#95;FMul</a>(L, R));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Match any add operation (fp or integer).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#a93a97c876de2b13925eedd660ac411f9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a93a97c876de2b13925eedd660ac411f9">m&#95;AnyAdd</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LTy &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RTy &amp;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given an element pointer \\p BasePtr to the start of a (sub) matrix, compute</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the start address of vector \\p VecIdx with type (\\p EltType x \\p NumElements)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assuming \\p Stride elements between start two consecutive vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// \\p Stride must be &gt;= \\p NumElements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For column-major matrixes, the function computes the address of a column</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors and \\p NumElements must be set to the number of elements in a column</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (= number of rows of the matrix). For row-major matrixes, the function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// computes the address of a row vector and \\p NumElements must be set to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of elements in a column (= number of columns of the matrix).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consider a 4x4 matrix in column-mjaor layout like below</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      0       1      2      3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0   v&#95;0&#95;0  v&#95;0&#95;1  v&#95;0&#95;2  v&#95;0&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1   v&#95;1&#95;0  v&#95;1&#95;1  v&#95;1&#95;2  v&#95;1&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2   v&#95;2&#95;0  v&#95;2&#95;1  v&#95;2&#95;2  v&#95;2&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3   v&#95;3&#95;0  v&#95;3&#95;1  v&#95;3&#95;2  v&#95;3&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To compute the column addresses for a 2x3 sub-matrix at row 1 and column 1,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we need a pointer to the first element of the submatrix as base pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then we can use computeVectorAddr to compute the addresses for the columns</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the sub-matrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Column 0: computeVectorAddr(Base, 0 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           -&gt; just returns Base</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Column 1: computeVectorAddr(Base, 1 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           -&gt; returns Base + (1 &#42; 4)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Column 2: computeVectorAddr(Base, 2 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           -&gt; returns Base + (2 &#42; 4)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The graphic below illustrates the number of elements in a column (marked</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with |) and the number of skipped elements (marked with &#125;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         v&#95;0&#95;0  v&#95;0&#95;1 &#123;v&#95;0&#95;2 &#123;v&#95;0&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                Base   Col 1  Col 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                  |     |      |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         v&#95;1&#95;0 |v&#95;1&#95;1 |v&#95;1&#95;2 |v&#95;1&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         v&#95;2&#95;0 |v&#95;2&#95;1 |v&#95;2&#95;2 |v&#95;2&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         v&#95;3&#95;0 &#123;v&#95;3&#95;1 &#123;v&#95;3&#95;2  v&#95;3&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/#a827ab2e54dd47060734cc255e8af3bb9"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/#a827ab2e54dd47060734cc255e8af3bb9">computeVectorAddr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BasePtr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VecIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Stride,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltType,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Stride) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Stride)-&gt;getZExtValue() &gt;= NumElements) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Stride must be &gt;= the number of elements in the result vector.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the start of the vector with index VecIdx as VecIdx &#42; Stride.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VecStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aecd40f9a16dc0ef1e0bc416599f89277">CreateMul</a>(VecIdx, Stride, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;vec.start&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get pointer to the start of the selected vector. Skip GEP creation,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if we select vector 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VecStart) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VecStart)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lint-cpp/#a45005634b54e2126cb3e6ec0dbc9ade4">isZero</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    VecStart = BasePtr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    VecStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(EltType, BasePtr, VecStart, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;vec.gep&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecStart;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LowerMatrixIntrinsics contains the methods used to lower matrix intrinsics.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Currently, the lowering for each matrix intrinsic is done as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 Propagate the shape information from intrinsics to connected</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 Lower instructions with shape information (assuming column-major layout).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">///  The lowering works similarly using row-major layout.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2.1. Get column vectors for each argument. If we already lowered the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">///       definition of an argument, use the produced column vectors directly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment">///       If not, split the operand vector containing an embedded matrix into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment">///       a set of column vectors,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2.2. Lower the instruction in terms of column major operations, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">///       yields a set of column vectors containing result matrix. Note that we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">///       lower all instructions that have shape information. Besides the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">///       intrinsics, this includes stores for example.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2.3. Update uses of the lowered instruction. If we have shape information</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">///       for a user, there is nothing to do, as we will look up the result</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">///       column matrix when lowering the user. For other uses, we embed the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">///       result matrix in a flat vector and update the use.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2.4. Cache the result column matrix for the instruction we lowered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 After we lowered all instructions in a function, remove the now</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">///    obsolete instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aecb18b3bdad8c28a5e4b0dcf73c17211">LowerMatrixIntrinsics</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;Func;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;DL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;TTI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &#42;AM;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae457f1cf451ed893666c4a384e58f8e5">AliasAnalysis</a> &#42;AA = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#42;ORE = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Contains estimates of the number of operations (loads, stores, compute) required to lower a matrix operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">OpInfoTy &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Number of stores emitted to generate this matrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumStores = 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Number of loads emitted to generate this matrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumLoads = 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Number of compute operations emitted to generate this matrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumComputeOps = 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Most of the time transposes can be fused with matrix multiplies or can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// be folded away via algebraic simplifications.  This is the number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// transposes that we failed to make &quot;free&quot; via such optimizations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumExposedTransposes = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    OpInfoTy &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a34adc9d568f5992da64241a5e1a04741">operator+=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpInfoTy &amp;RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumStores += RHS.NumStores;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumLoads += RHS.NumLoads;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumComputeOps += RHS.NumComputeOps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumExposedTransposes += RHS.NumExposedTransposes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Maps instructions to their shape information. The shape information</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// describes the shape to be used while lowering. This matches the shape of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the result value of the instruction, with the only exceptions being store</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions and the matrix&#95;column&#95;major&#95;store intrinsics. For those, the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// shape information indicates that those instructions should be lowered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// using shape information as well. Note that extra care is needed when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// erasing or RAUW&#39;ing a value that is present in ShapeMap. If the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// replacement is also a matrix operation, use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// updateShapeAndReplaceAllUsesWith to make sure the replacement is added to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ShapeMap.  We don&#39;t use ValueMap, as there are also cases where we do not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// want to add shape information for a replacement instruction. When directly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// erasing a value with an entry in ShapeMap, use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// eraseFromParentAndRemoveFromShapeMap to make sure ShapeMap is also updated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// accordingly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, ShapeInfo&gt;</a> ShapeMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// List of instructions to remove. While lowering, we are not replacing all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// users of a lowered instruction, if shape information is available and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// those need to be removed after we finished lowering.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ToRemove;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Map from instructions to their produced column matrix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Value &#42;, MatrixTy&gt;</a> Inst2ColumnMatrix;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the set of vectors that a matrix value is lowered to.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If we lowered \\p MatrixVal, just return the cache result matrix. Otherwise</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// split the flat vector \\p MatrixVal containing a matrix with shape \\p SI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// into vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aad5def33faf75944be159808071d9698"><Highlight kind="normal">  MatrixTy <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aad5def33faf75944be159808071d9698">getMatrix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;MatrixVal, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShapeInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we lowered MatrixVal using shape information. In that case,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return the existing matrix, if it matches the requested shape</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// information. If there is a mis-match, embed the result in a flat</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector and split it later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Found = Inst2ColumnMatrix.find(MatrixVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Found != Inst2ColumnMatrix.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">      MatrixTy &amp;M = Found-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the found matrix, if its shape matches the requested shape</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// information</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.NumRows == M.getNumRows() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.NumColumns == M.getNumColumns())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">      MatrixVal = M.embedInVector(Builder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise split MatrixVal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 16&gt;</a> SplitVecs;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;split&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitVecs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShapeInfo Shape = ShapeMap&#91;V&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add a new entry to ShapeMap for \\p New with \\p Old&#39;s shape info, erase the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// entry for \\p Old and replace all uses of \\p Old with \\p New.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a90987ac6a5075492b12b46acd6e9814c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a90987ac6a5075492b12b46acd6e9814c">updateShapeAndReplaceAllUsesWith</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;New) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to remove Old from the ShapeMap otherwise RAUW will replace it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with New. We should only add New it it supportsShapeInfo so we insert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it conditionally instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> S = ShapeMap.find(&amp;Old);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (S != ShapeMap.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShapeMap.erase(S);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#ad5033b68f601a44246af550c825892a5">supportsShapeInfo</a>(New))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShapeMap.insert(&#123;New, S-&gt;second&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">    Old.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(New);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this returns nullptr, no new instruction was created.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the alignment for a column/row \\p Idx with \\p Stride between them.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The address at \\p Idx == 0 has alignment \\p A. If \\p Stride is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ConstantInt, reduce the initial alignment based on the byte offset. For</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// non-ConstantInt strides, return the common alignment of the initial</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// alignment and the element size in bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#afbbb137bc7dc3b49d14cd4fd73a75dcf"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#afbbb137bc7dc3b49d14cd4fd73a75dcf">getAlignForIndex</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Stride, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ElementTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> InitialAlign = DL.getValueOrABITypeAlignment(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, ElementTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Idx == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InitialAlign;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> ElementSizeInBits = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(ElementTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ConstStride = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Stride)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t StrideInBytes =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">          ConstStride-&gt;getZExtValue() &#42; ElementSizeInBits / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(InitialAlign, Idx &#42; StrideInBytes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><Highlight kind="normal">          EmbedCost +=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><Highlight kind="normal">              TTI.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaa9e18b2636661e341804da24971997df">TTI::SK&#95;Splice</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EmbedCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a0698afabe907d2d3b87889d2e0349d47">m&#95;BinOp</a>()) &amp;&amp; ShapeMap.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) != ShapeMap.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OriginalCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">            TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanslp-cpp/#a06b4f19004df11b338ccc7e73bf47ab4">getOpcode</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       EltTy) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> NewCost = TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanslp-cpp/#a06b4f19004df11b338ccc7e73bf47ab4">getOpcode</a>(), VecTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewCost - OriginalCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3c0adc1054838f4498e0e860b637a22b">m&#95;Intrinsic&lt;Intrinsic::matrix&#95;transpose&gt;</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The transpose can be skipped for the dot product lowering, roughly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// estimate the savings as the cost of embedding the columns in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> EmbedCost(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">          EmbedCost -=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">              TTI.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaa9e18b2636661e341804da24971997df">TTI::SK&#95;Splice</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EmbedCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Costs for loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TTI.getMemoryOpCost(Instruction::Load, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1), 0) -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &#42; TTI.getMemoryOpCost(Instruction::Load, EltTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over LHS and operations feeding LHS and check if it is profitable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to flatten the visited ops.  For each op, we compute the difference</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between the flattened and matrix versions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Seen;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> WorkList;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> ToFlatten;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">    WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(LHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LHSCost(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Seen.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OpCost = GetCostForArg(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, LShape.NumColumns);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpCost + LHSCost &gt;= LHSCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">      LHSCost += OpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">      ToFlatten.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">        WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;op&#95;end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We compare the costs of a vector.reduce.add to sequential add.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddOpCode = IsIntVec ? Instruction::Add : Instruction::FAdd;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MulOpCode = IsIntVec ? Instruction::Mul : Instruction::FMul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ReductionCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">        TTI.getArithmeticReductionCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">            AddOpCode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(LHS-&gt;getType()),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">            IsIntVec ? std::nullopt : std::optional(FMF)) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(MulOpCode, LHS-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> SequentialAddCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(AddOpCode, ElementType) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">            (LShape.NumColumns - 1) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(MulOpCode, ElementType) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">            (LShape.NumColumns);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((LHSCost + ReductionCost - SequentialAddCost) &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">    FusedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(MatMul);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(MatMul);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FlattenArg = &#91;&amp;Builder, &amp;FusedInsts, &amp;CanBeFlattened,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Matmul must be the only user of loads because we don&#39;t use LowerLoad</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for row vectors (LowerLoad results in scalar loads and shufflevectors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of single vector load).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CanBeFlattened(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a0698afabe907d2d3b87889d2e0349d47">m&#95;BinOp</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = ShapeMap.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It != ShapeMap.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="normal">          It-&gt;second = It-&gt;second.t();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><Highlight kind="normal">      FusedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If vector uses the builtin load, lower to a LoadInst</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Arg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3c0adc1054838f4498e0e860b637a22b">m&#95;Intrinsic&lt;Intrinsic::matrix&#95;column&#95;major&#95;load&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(Arg)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;NewLoad = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType(), Arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute \\p Result += \\p A &#42; \\p B for input matrices with left-associating</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We can fold a transpose into the operand that is used to extract scalars.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is the first operands with row-major and the second with</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal">    ShapeInfo LShape(MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(2), MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(3));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R = LShape.NumRows;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = RShape.NumColumns;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M = LShape.NumColumns;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;EltType = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getElementType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = std::max&lt;unsigned&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal">        TTI.getRegisterBitWidth(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a8bb3b1ccf19b8c85429b777dfa4a0166a183020fbea95c99db23f6d3594f4c4af">TargetTransformInfo::RGK&#95;FixedWidthVector</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">                .getFixedValue() /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal">            EltType-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits().getFixedValue(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal">        1U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cost model for tiling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For tiling to be beneficial, we need reuse either along the R or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the C axis.  We vectorize along the R axis so that means at least</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3 elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Also consider cost of copying if operands alias.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R &lt;= VF &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then we need enough elements to exceed the number of vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers we have.  Note that this is an oversimplification since</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fusing also takes some extra loads which may exceed the number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reloads necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Op0Regs = (R + VF - 1) / VF &#42; M;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Op1Regs = (M + VF - 1) / VF &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Op0Regs + Op1Regs &gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="normal">           TTI.getNumberOfRegisters(TTI.getRegisterClassForType(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a897ffb621380e9230778c792ca27d9c4"><Highlight kind="normal">  MatrixTy <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a897ffb621380e9230778c792ca27d9c4">getZeroMatrix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltType, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
