<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Deal with lifetime.end calls that might be between Load0/Load1 and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// store. To avoid introducing loads to dead objects (i.e. after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lifetime has been termined by @llvm.lifetime.end), either sink them</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the store if in the same block, or remove the lifetime.end marker</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// otherwise. This might pessimize further optimizations, by extending the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lifetime of the object until the function returns, but should be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conservatively correct.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> Load0Loc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a18e5a3f1d71ba10a624f2a8e5121cf1f">MemoryLocation::get</a>(LoadOp0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> Load1Loc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a18e5a3f1d71ba10a624f2a8e5121cf1f">MemoryLocation::get</a>(LoadOp1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;StoreParent = Store-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FusableOpsInSameBlock = LoadOp0-&gt;getParent() == StoreParent &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   LoadOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>() == StoreParent;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0; Idx != LifetimeEnds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &#42;End = LifetimeEnds&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Inc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1af45c4dc83c083c5ae914d96fd3ce96">make&#95;scope&#95;exit</a>(&#91;&amp;Idx&#93;() &#123; Idx++; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the lifetime.end is guaranteed to be before the loads or after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// store, it won&#39;t interfere with fusion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DT-&gt;dominates(End, LoadOp0) &amp;&amp; DT-&gt;dominates(End, LoadOp1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DT-&gt;dominates(Store, End))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If all fusable ops are in the same block and the lifetime.end is in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different block, it won&#39;t interfere with fusion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FusableOpsInSameBlock &amp;&amp; End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() != StoreParent)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the loads don&#39;t alias the lifetime.end, it won&#39;t interfere with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fusion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> EndLoc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#afc51de08aefeeaabc77fefacc869dbd4">MemoryLocation::getForArgument</a>(End, 1, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!EndLoc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AA-&gt;isNoAlias(Load0Loc, EndLoc) &amp;&amp; AA-&gt;isNoAlias(Load1Loc, EndLoc))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both lifetime.end and the store are in the same block, extend the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lifetime until after the store, so the new lifetime covers the loads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we introduce later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() == StoreParent) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><Highlight kind="normal">          End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a54507f01d7d06127068ee0663233511d">moveAfter</a>(Store);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise remove the conflicting lifetime.end marker.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><Highlight kind="normal">        ToRemove.push&#95;back(End);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewNumVecs =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewNumElts =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><Highlight kind="normal">        InputMatrix.isColumnMajor() ? ArgShape.NumColumns : ArgShape.NumRows;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NewNumVecs; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Build a single result vector. First initialize it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ResultVector = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Go through the old elements and insert it into the resulting vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Add:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Generate remarks for matrix operations in a function. To generate remarks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for matrix expressions, the following approach is used:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 Use the inlined-at debug information to group matrix operations to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    DISubprograms they are contained in.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 Collect leaves of matrix expressions (done in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    RemarkGenerator::getExpressionLeaves) for each subprogram - expression</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     mapping.  Leaves are lowered matrix instructions without other matrix</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     users (like stores) in the current subprogram.</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 3 For each leaf, create a remark containing a linearizied version of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    matrix expression. The expression is linearized by a recursive</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    bottom-up traversal of the matrix operands, starting at a leaf. Note</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    that multiple leaves can share sub-expressions. Shared subexpressions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    are explicitly marked as shared().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894">RemarkGenerator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Value &#42;, MatrixTy&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a4ef49bb5322c89feceb7a78f5e01a179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a4ef49bb5322c89feceb7a78f5e01a179">DL</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894">RemarkGenerator</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Value &#42;, MatrixTy&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><Highlight kind="normal">        : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a4ef49bb5322c89feceb7a78f5e01a179">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>.getDataLayout()) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Return all leaves of the expressions in \\p ExprsInSubprogram. Those are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// instructions in Inst2Matrix returning void or without any users in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// \\p ExprsInSubprogram. Currently that should only include stores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a53d241b242a10e4f387b39e4497054db"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a53d241b242a10e4f387b39e4497054db">getExpressionLeaves</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;Value &#42;, 32&gt;</a> &amp;ExprsInSubprogram) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Leaves;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Expr : ExprsInSubprogram)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Expr-&gt;getType()-&gt;isVoidTy() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><Highlight kind="normal">            !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(Expr-&gt;users(), &#91;&amp;ExprsInSubprogram&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><Highlight kind="normal">              return ExprsInSubprogram.count(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504"><Highlight kind="normal">          Leaves.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Expr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
